title.value: Determination of concentration and disperse composition of mechanical impurities in the oil of redactors of melioration multi-rotor mowers
Определение концентрации и дисперсного состава механических примесей в масле редукторов мелиоративных многороторных косилок

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Borisov, A.L., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was based the necessity of determination of concentration and disperse composition of mechanical impurities in the oil of redactors of melioration multi-rotor mowers. There were described methods of research and shown the graph, which reflects the dependence of the change in concentration of mechanical impurities in oil on operating time. There were built integral and differential curves of countable distribution of particles of mechanical impurities. It was established that concentration of mechanical impurities in the oil of redactor amounts to 1.15% in the mower AS-1 and 0.9% in mowers K-78M. Modal value of the size corresponded to 50-55 micrometer.
